body_html:
What’s you motherboard/system? Some Supermicro PCIe systems are known to have this bug. I have met the same issue and upgrading BIOS firmware resolves this issue.

Yes, it was Supermicro bug. I updated BIOS and I fixed my problem!

Thanks for your concerning.

Yes, it was Supermicro bug. I updated BIOS and I fixed my problem!

Thanks for your concerning.
